participant_1.background:
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
i have five children.
my doctor told me i have six months to live.
i drive a bmw.
I spend my days doing whatever I want, without a care in the world.

participant_2.background:
I visited my best friend in Japan, and learned about the country's culture and history.
My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music.
i have a small beagle dog who i call droopy.
i don t like wearing a swimsuit.
i make 35 million a year.

content.text: Not too bad.  I'm just trying to learn how to swim.
Oh, that's cool!  I love to swim.  I was on my swim team all throughout high school.
I've never really been good at it.  I'm trying to learn so I can take my kids to the beach this summer.
That's awesome!  I'm sure they'll love it.  What kind of dog do you have?
I have a beagle named Droopy.
Beagles are the best!  I love their big floppy ears.
Me too!  I can't imagine not having him around.
Do you have any other pets?
No, just Droopy.  He's a handful, but I wouldn't trade him for the world.
I'm sure he loves you very much.  What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom.  I have five kids, so it keeps me busy!
Wow!  That's a lot of kids.  I'm sure you have your hands full.  What's your favorite thing to do with your kids?
I love to take them to the park.  They love to run around and play.
That sounds like a lot of fun.  I'm sure they love it when you take them.
They do!  It's the best part of my day.
I'm sure it is.  It sounds like you have a great life.
